title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page display automatic borders, making them appear as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these text fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a Project. 
2. Right click and select 'Properties'. 
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the readonly fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as text fields.
